description:
Nine Times and More

A man died in the street I lived. They put white powder to dry the blood so it doesnâ€™t leave a mark on the sidewalk.
A few days before I started a photo-diary, a compilation of things that caught my eye.
A note in spanish appeared, and some flowers.
After some time, the note, the flowers, the blood and the white powder disappeared.
This is a photo-diary of this time.
